title: Riot... Nerfed... Eve... In... 5.20...
body:
Riot... Are you serious? Why in the name of Zilean would you nerf her. Holy moly. 
Source: http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/pbe-round-up-patch-5-20-47735/

replies.body: its also the mana cost of her W... if you are spamming W in the jungle, you are doing it wrong.

you made a whole thread to complain about a mana increase on a champ with such little mana issues? if you're so worried at least now you have more reason to go cinderhulk roa rylais which is pretty damn efficient
It's not what the nerf does, it's just why they're doing it? It's not a massive nerf, but on the same note, why in the name of Zilean? "Oh we better add a mana cost to eve's W just cos'"
Like nerfing a jungler's mana costs does anything.
you know this is all from the pbe and as we know they will nerf a champ in the pbe and then buff it on the patch
Eve is pretty strong if played right. The Invisibility, the damage, and the giant ult shield.
its 40 mana wtf she has no probs with mana why is this guy complaining that's like saying ow no they are nerfing {{champion:150}} mana
Lol he thinks eve is weak.
